summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Gold Ridge Beast

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Gold Ridge Beast

The Gold Ridge Beast can be found in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge within the secret Kingdom of Shahali area. It is located in a chest on the far side of the area. You must open this chest before you defeat Fuban as the area becomes inaccessible once the boss is defeated."
            - Following Text: "A full walkthrough of how to access this area can be found below:

Be sure to sell it at a vendor or the Shrine store as soon as you can.

For even more guides and tips on finding all the items in the game, be sure to check out our guide on all the Black Myth: Wukong Weapons locations and Armor and Gear locations, as well as the Gourds, Curios, Vessels, and Transformation Spells locations. You can also find a library of all the Medicine Ingredients and Consumable Items in the game."

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.


            
            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.
img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:  
The preceding text introduces the "Gold Ridge Beast," a treasure item found in the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is located in a chest within the Yellow Wind Ridge area of the secret Kingdom of Shahali. Players must retrieve it before defeating the boss, Fuban, as the area becomes inaccessible afterward.

Image Summary:  
The image displays the in-game inventory screen, highlighting the "Gold Ridge Beast," an epic treasure item. The item description notes that it once adorned the roof of a Buddha Hall and suggests it may have trade value. The inventory interface also shows other collectible materials and the player's current currency total.

Following Text Summary:  
The following text provides additional gameplay tips, advising players to sell the "Gold Ridge Beast" at a vendor or the Shrine store promptly. It also directs players to related guides for locating other items in *Black Myth: Wukong*, including weapons, armor, consumables, and other collectibles.
